item.title: Bridge for iOS and Android
item.description: Bridge is a need-based search, communication, and networking tool that helps you find and access the right person for whatever you need, leveraging the network effect (“six degrees of separation”) of your friends and colleagues. Bridge is also an omnipresent social capital exchange / platform / wallet, keeping track of “favors” between people, estimating how close the a person is to everyone in his or her network (phonebook) and establishing virtual currency that represents the “social capital” of each user.
